level.heading: Deposit of fines.
level.text: Money inuring to the District as a result of the fines imposed under § 2-708 shall be deposited in the Treasury of the United States to the credit of the District of Columbia or in any other depository designated by the Council.

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 1-118
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 1-118, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 2-701.
